CatDescriptText: Mr. Jin Shimada, Missouri University student, Toyko, Japan, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column, published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 11, 1962, pg. 7 with question: "What is the best way to end nuclear testing?" Answer reads: "First we have to know each other better. I think the American people are very prejudiced.  For Communism they have only hate and don't want to understand them.  Now that Russia is changing from year to year, she wants to compromise with the free world."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Jin Shimada carrying camera over shoulder, posed in front of H. Alexander & Co. Stationary, Wood Street, Downtown
